Package tse.fise2.image3.cardmatcher.sift

Class Sift

java.lang.Object
tse.fise2.image3.cardmatcher.sift.Sift
public class Sift extends Object
This class implements the four main steps involved in SIFT algorithm to make descriptors and recognition managing. It mainly uses the OpenCV library.

  • Method Details

    • getDescriptor

      public static tse.fise2.image3.cardmatcher.sift.Descriptor getDescriptor(org.opencv.core.Mat image, String name)
      This method allows to extract and compute the SIFT descriptors of an input image. It uses the OpenCV features2D package to process the image and get its descriptors.
      Parameters:
      image - the image we want to extract the descriptors of.
      name - the name of the image
      Returns:
      Descriptor the descriptors of the image .

    • saveDescriptor

      public static void saveDescriptor(tse.fise2.image3.cardmatcher.sift.Descriptor desc) throws IOException
      Saves SIFT descriptor into a CSV file
      Parameters:
      desc - the descriptor to be saved
      Throws:
      IOException - if the file cannot be written

    • readDescriptor

      public static List<tse.fise2.image3.cardmatcher.sift.Descriptor> readDescriptor() throws IOException
      Reads SIFT descriptor from a CSV file The file is read line by line and its values are added to a list.
      Returns:
      a list of descriptors
      Throws:
      IOException - if the file cannot be read

    • calculateProximityScore

      public static double calculateProximityScore(org.opencv.core.Mat referenceDescriptors, org.opencv.core.Mat databaseDescriptors)
      This method allows to calculate the proximity score between reference descriptors and database descriptors using L1 distance
      Parameters:
      referenceDescriptors - the reference descriptors to compare
      databaseDescriptors - the database descriptors to compare
      Returns:
      proximityScore the proximity score between the descriptors of the two images.

    • getTop3ImageBestScore

      public static List<ScoreImage> getTop3ImageBestScore(org.opencv.core.Mat referenceDescriptors) throws IOException
      Read the descriptor from the csv file and return the closest 3 descriptors to the descriptors of the tested image.
      Parameters:
      referenceDescriptors - the descriptors of the tested image.
      Returns:
      the list of descriptor objects
      Throws:
      IOException - if the file is not found
